data.name: AboutShow_Paragraph_2
data.value: The show "ITBeard" is about the life of IT people from the inside and with its episodes tells about programming languages, popular technologies, professions, famous representatives of the sphere and their way of development.

data.name: AboutShow_Paragraph_3
data.value: Without any censorship, labels or extra pathos.

data.name: Programming_Paragraph_1
data.value: One of the main tasks of the show is to cover all existing programming languages. And it's pretty good at it, most of the languages are already represented on the channel!

data.name: Programming_Paragraph_2
data.value: Listen to the description of your favorite languages and expand your skills ðŸ˜‰

data.name: Bonus_Discord_Paragraph_2
data.value: You can also contact me directly there, discuss episodes and projects, suggest a guest, and participate in the Â«Beard NewsÂ».

data.name: Bonus_News_Paragraph_1
data.value: For those who support me, every month I record a podcast called Â«Beard NewsÂ». In this podcast I talk about IT gossip, events in my life, new and old content, and upcoming plans.

data.name: Bonus_News_Paragraph_2
data.value: Solocast is available to ITBeard sponsors and all patrons on Patreon.

data.name: Interview_Paragraph_1
data.value: The main format of the show is interviews with active people from the IT world. They are the real Rock Stars who move our industry forward!

data.name: PageTitle
data.value: The "ITBarade" show - life and work in IT
